sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.prompt:
Write the text according to the following outline:
1. GEO: [Geo]
2. Language: [Lang]
3. Number of words: 75
4. Keywords to use: [Brand] online casino Ireland
5. Description: General introduction: brief description of the casino brand, how it differs from other online casinos, what advantages it offers players. Emphasize that you can get a bonus when you register, but without specifics (this information will be provided below). Don`t write title. Place the keyword naturally in the middle of the paragraph (not in the first sentence; ideally around 40–70% of the text). Keep the flow human-like and avoid keyword stuffing. Do not highlight, bold, italicize, capitalize, or put the keyword in quotes.

Mention popular sports categories without listing specific odds or matches. No overlap with casino games content. Write the text in one paragraph

sub_fields.label: Content

Write the text according to the following outline:
1. Heading 3 = [Brand] Casino Bonus ohne Einzahlung
2. GEO: [Geo]
3. Language: [Lang]
4. Number of words: 50
5. Keywords to use: [Brand] casino no deposit bonus
6. Description: Description of the no deposit bonus: why it is given, what restrictions often apply. Without technical details of how to obtain it.

Write the text according to the following outline:
1. Heading 3 = [Brand] Casino Bonus Code
2. GEO: [Geo]
3. Language: [Lang]
4. Number of words: 50
5. Keywords to use: [Brand] casino promo code
6. Description: Write about the bonus or promo code, explaining its purpose (why the casino offers it), what value it gives to players, and which common restrictions usually apply (such as wagering requirements or validity limits). Do NOT include technical instructions on how to claim or activate the bonus.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.prompt:
Write the text according to the following outline:
1. Heading 3 = Einzahlungsmethoden
2. GEO: [Geo]
3. Language: [Lang]
4. Number of words: 100
5. Keywords to use: [Brand] casino online
6. Description: 
6.1 Just after heading you must create a deposit methods table for an online casino, adapted to the market of [Geo] for brend [Brand]. Do not give me additional heading in the output
Table language: [Lang]
Currency: LOCAL CURRENCY
Before creating the table, research online which deposit methods are really used in online casinos in the target country and adapt the content to local market standards.
Use only popular and realistic payment methods for this country. All amounts must be shown in the local currency and written in the target language.
Table columns (must be translated into the [Lang] language):
"Method"
"Available for Deposit"
"Minimum Deposit (indicative)"
"Deposit Fees"
"Processing Time"
Style: clear, neutral, casino-oriented.
The table title must be localized for the target language and country.

6.2 Then just after table you must write information about account deposit methods: supported payment methods, minimum amount, possible fees, processing time. Differences depending on the user's country. No mention of registration or withdrawal.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.prompt:
Write the text according to the following outline:
1. Heading 3 = Auszahlungsmethoden
2. GEO: [Geo]
3. Language: [Lang]
4. Number of words: 100
5. Keywords to use: [Brand] casino auszahlung
6. Description:  
6.1 Just after heading you must create a withdrawal methods table for an online casino, adapted to the market of [Geo] for brend [Brand]. Do not give me additional heading in the output
Table language: [Lang]
Currency: LOCAL CURRENCY
Research online which withdrawal methods are actually available and commonly used in online casinos in the target country, and adapt the table accordingly.
Use realistic processing times, limits, and verification requirements where applicable. All amounts must be shown in the local currency and written in the target language.
Table columns (must be translated into the [Lang] language):
"Method"
"Available for Withdrawal"
"Minimum Withdrawal (indicative)"
"Withdrawal Fees"
"Processing Time"
Style: professional, user-friendly, suitable for an online casino website.
The table title must be localized for the target language and country.

6.2 Then just after table you must write step-by-step withdrawal guide: available methods, processing times, fees, limits. Identity verification, if required. Do not duplicate deposit information.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.prompt:
Write the text according to the following outline: 1. Date: 2. Domain: 3. GEO: [Geo] 4. Language: [Lang] 5. Description: Create a “Responsible Gaming” page text for an online casino brand. The output must be provided as plain text (not inside a code block), but it must contain all required HTML tags exactly as written. Start with an

“Responsible Gaming” in [Lang]. Then add a new line with Effective date: [Date]. After that, write an introductory paragraph explaining that this Responsible Gaming page on the website [Domain] describes the principles and measures used by [Brand] to promote safe, balanced, and transparent play, and that the goal is entertainment without harming personal, family, or financial wellbeing. Then include

sections numbered 1–7 in this exact format:

1. …

through

7. …

. Each section must include a short explanatory paragraph; where appropriate, include an unordered list using
  • …
. The sections must cover: (1) commitment to responsible gaming, (2) gambling as entertainment (include a list of practical tips), (3) control and self-protection tools (limits, breaks, self-exclusion), (4) signs of problematic gambling (include a list of warning signs), (5) protection of minors (must mention 18+), (6) support and seeking help, (7) assistance and contact. In section 7 (Assistance and Contact), include a short paragraph about customer support helping users with responsible gaming tools and limit settings. Then include the contact details exactly as two separate lines, each on its own new line (do not merge them into one line), with the following HTML and nothing extra:

Email: support@[Domain]

Site web: [Domain]

Finish with a short closing sentence encouraging responsible play and keeping entertainment under control, mentioning [Brand]. Do not add any other contact fields. Keep the tone formal and supportive, adapt wording to [Geo] and [Lang].

Then include

sections numbered 1–10 in this exact format:

1. …

through
